data.text:
The hotel is huge, the Sentido and Reef Oasis are next to each other and Sentido guests can use both. The rooms are a little dated but the Service is excellent. 

On arrival we had a problem with the patio door in our room and Mohamed Zohairy had us moved to a better room very quickly and gave us a personal tour of the resort by golf buggy.

Medhat Amr from the blue bar worked hard to learn our coffee and wine preferences and brought us drinks and snacks to our pool loungers.

At Mos buffet we had the best service from Medhat, Mahmoud, his deputy and the team,. They greeted us at every meal and talked me through the food options for me as I am Gluten and Dairy free. They were absolutely exceptional and even went as far as to make me specific bread and deserts to give me more options! Asif was our server and learned all our preferences and anticipated our needs brilliantly.

We booked into two Al a carte restaurants and the team briefed the staff at these and went ahead and made sure our needs were catered for which was fantastic.

Our housekeeping team in 1258 were excellent, going the extra mile to clean well but also to leave us flower and towel art!

All of the staff were amazing, they seemed genuinely keen to ensure we had a great time. We were blown away by their kindness and will be back with our families for a longer trip!

Thanks again team!
data.title: 5 day girls trip

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

First of all thank you for your recent stay at SENTIDO Reef Oasis Resort Sharm El Sheikh.

We are very happy that you enjoyed your holiday with us .

We do also appreciated your time taken to share your experience with us.

We hope to host you here as usual to show you our warm hospitality as you have faced during your stay with us.
Best Regards.

Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Yasser Azab

data.text: What a wonderful Hotel and Resort. All the staff were amazing  nothing too much trouble. The food was amazing , so much.Will definitely go back. Could not fault this Hotel it was amazing. Cannot stress how marvellous this hotel and staff are. Had such a wonderful experience.Thank you all so much. X
data.title: Amazing place

owner_response.author: Yasser Azab

data.text:
As we had a. Fabulous holiday here in October 2023, we rebooked.
I almost do not want to share my views, so I can keep this hotel and staff to myself.
The Sentidio resort and staff are amazing. We were made to feel like the most important people daily. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff who were Eager  to a bilge. 
The food was good and a lot of choice.  Gabriel, Hassan and Mina were fantastic, and very funny. We had daily banter with them, which we clearly enjoyed and hoped it made their day too. I bow down to their professionalism.
The al a cart restaurants were all great and came out well fed. The Italian again the staff were brilliant, Arafat, and the manager, who I now canâ€™t recall his name. excellent service also in the grill and Indian restaurant.

What can I say about the lads Medhat and Khalil in the blue bar. They were amazing keeping us topped up with drinks. Medhat had the most infectious laugh. 

Finally Mahmoud Nasief, you are a real diamond, a lovely kind and  helpful man and manager. It is no wonder your staff are excellent with you as a role model.

We look forward to coming back and I am sorry if I have missed anyone out.
data.title: What a Gem of a place

data.text:
Hello
Regarding to our holiday last week on your hotel, room 1269,  was very nice. We enjoyed every day of the  vacation with pleasure and relaxed to the maximum. We want to say a big thank you to your manager of the restaurant, Mohmmes Osmen, who was very generous with us. He was very organised every day. Also big thank  you to  Mesham Acsham, who was very helpful and very kind. A big thank you to barman, Hassan, who was also very helpful and was deserved us with good drinks and cocktails ðŸ˜Š. And Gabriel Ali ( waiter of restaurant) was very kind and generous. A big big thank you to all of this people who was with us all days and helped us to enjoying our holiday on your hotel. Have a nice day and see you soon 
With love from Family Sula Victor and Liuba
data.title: An unforgettable vacation in your hotelðŸ˜Š

data.text:
Lovely hotel, and great location with some excellent snorkelling. The staff were amazing, particularly Gabriel and Hassan making the drinks in the restaurant and the Blue Bar team. The waiting staff and cleaning team were also extremely hospitable, we couldnâ€™t have wished for a friendlier welcome. Mohammed in the beach bar and Alex organising snorkelling/diving were also knowledgable and friendly. Bedo in the animation team always stopped to say hello and help us when needed. The lifeguard team were also attentive, always helping to get sunloungers and towels.

Great for families wanting some winter sun and a relaxing break.
data.title: Great resort, friendly staff
